title: Nicole: A Private Investigator Mystery
description: Jason Adams leads a semi-normal life as a private investigator in Los Angeles. However, his life is turned upside down when his ex-fiance, who left him for another man, shows up after three years and asks Jason to help her find that man. Jason is left with two difficult decisions: Will he risk his life to save the man who ruined his happiness, and, more importantly, can he forgive Nicole and trust her again?
author: Hunter Pearson
